tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dear Dr. Snehal Thakkar,

I hope this message finds you in good health. I am writing to provide feedback on the dental surgery I underwent yesterday for cyst removal under your care. I would like to express my utmost appreciation for the exceptional quality of care and professionalism demonstrated by you and your team throughout the entire procedure.

From the moment I entered your clinic, I was greeted with warmth and compassion, which immediately put me at ease. Your friendly demeanor and ability to explain the procedure in a clear and concise manner greatly alleviated my anxiety. You took the time to address all my concerns and patiently answered my questions, ensuring that I felt comfortable and well-informed.

During the surgery, I was particularly impressed by your expertise and skill. Your hands were incredibly gentle, which made the experience far less uncomfortable than I anticipated. The smoothness with which you performed the procedure was truly remarkable, and it is evident that you possess a high level of technical proficiency.

Additionally, the post-operative care instructions you provided were comprehensive and easy to understand. Your attentiveness in ensuring that I had a clear understanding of the steps to follow for a speedy recovery was greatly appreciated. It is evident that you genuinely care about your patients' well-being beyond the surgery itself.

I am extremely satisfied with the care I received from you, Dr. Snehal Thakkar. Your professionalism, expertise, and compassionate approach have made a significant impact on my overall experience. I would highly recommend you to anyone in need of dental services, as your exceptional skills and dedication truly set you apart.

Thank you once again for your outstanding care, and I wish you continued success in your practice.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review:
I recently had the pleasure of being treated by Dr. Snehal Thakkar for the extraction of two molars, and I must say I was thoroughly impressed with her skill and expertise. Dr. Thakkar's hands were firm yet gentle, steady as a rock, and very effective in carrying out the procedure.

Throughout the extraction, Dr. Thakkar took the time to update me on what she was doing, which helped to calm my nerves and reassure me that I was in good hands. Her calm demeanor and clear communication made the entire process much more comfortable and manageable for me.

I would highly recommend Dr. Snehal Thakkar to anyone in need of dental surgery. Her professionalism, skill, and reassuring presence make her an invaluable asset to the field of dentistry. Thank you, Dr. Thakkar, for your excellent care and expertise.
reply_text: Thank you so much for the kind words Mr Shivdasani. Iâ€™m glad you had a pleasant experience.

review: When I went I was in a lot of stress. Dr Snehal with her frank, sweet talks helped me to overcome my nervousness. The entire procedure went very smoothly. Her hand is very light as I did not receive any pain during or after procedure. God Bless her. Thanks a lot Doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Doctor Thakkar

It was my first visit to a dentist and let me tell you a very pleasant experience, I had gone to her with a pain in one of my wisdom tooth, she explained me in great detail regarding the issue I was facing with my wisdom teeth.

I am suggested extraction of my decayed wisdom teeth and I am satisfied with her diagnosis and shall go ahead with my treatment with Dr.Thakkar.

Would recommend them to all looking for any kind of dental advise.

Dr Snehal is just brilliant with her work.  She has a lot of patience and explains everything very well.  She is very confident about the treatment that she  gives and makes sure you are comfortable.

The clinic is extremely clean and very well maintained.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your feedback:)

tags: None
review:
It was very good.
I had a wisdom tooth extraction.
Dr Snehal made sure i was in the least pain.
Follow up was also good. She was available on whatsapp and i gave her my regualer updates.
With in a week all pain and swelling had settled.
By the end of 2 weeks of my extraction i was able to eat all foods.

review: Went in for a check up and cleaning. I have visited Dr. Thakkar in the past for my father but this time it was for myself. As always, she is very friendly and professional. Pointed out exactly what the issues were, was quite thorough and gentle with the cleaning process. Personally I dislike dentist visits, the noises and machines can be overwhelming but this time it was a good experience. And will be more regular with visits hereon. Highly recommend.
